JavaScriptReferenceOperatorsImport.metaR.summary: import.meta.resolve() is a built-in function defined on the import.meta object of a JavaScript module that resolves a module specifier to a URL using the current module's URL as base.
JavaScriptReferenceOperatorsImport.metaR.returns: Returns a string corresponding to the path that would be imported if the argument were passed to import().
